summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of the alley in Block 5, Hunter's Lake Union Addition, being the alley as platted between Smith Street and Wheeler Street, east of 4th Avenue North; by paving and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Majority Petition No. 99785, to the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment of said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by mode of "Payment by Bonds".
